facebook

Class Connect

  • java.lang.Object
    • facebook.Connect

  • public class Connect
extends java.lang.Object
    This class connects the user with the Facebook servers.

    Date: 19/11/2018

    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    diogo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int publicationCounter
      A counter used to count the number of publications made

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void establishConnection()
      Establish connection: This method invokes the previously created method "getUserInfo" to establish a connection with the Facebook servers.
      java.lang.String getAccessToken()
      getAccessToken Receives the Access Token necessary to connect to the user's Facebook profile.
      int getCounter()
      A function used to obtain the number of posts in a list
      com.restfb.FacebookClient getFacebookClient()
      getFacebookCLient Receives the Access Token to obtain the Facebook profile of the user.
      int getPostSize()
      A function used to obtain the size of the list composed of posts.
      int getPublicationCounter()
      A function used to obtain the number of publications made by the user.
      com.restfb.types.User getUserInfo()
      getUserInfo Uses the method getFacebookClient to fetch the online profile of a specific Facebook user
      int getUserPublicationIDCounter()
      A function used to obtain the size of the list composed of the ID's of the posts published by the user.
      void printPosts()
      PrintPosts This method goes through the list of posts created by the method "establishConnection" and prints said posts.
      void publishImageStatus(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String directory, java.lang.String message)
      publishImageStatus Uses the publish method present in the RestFB API to post an image followed by a message.
      void publishLinkStatus(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String link)
      publishLinkStatus Uses the publish method present in the RestFB API to post a link with an associated message in the user's group.
      void publishMessageStatus(java.lang.String message)
      publishMessageStatus Uses the publish method present in the RestFB API to post a message in the user's group.

    • Method Detail

      • establishConnection

        public void establishConnection()
        Establish connection:

        This method invokes the previously created method "getUserInfo" to establish a connection with the Facebook servers.

        result, is a list of all the posts the user shared. group, is a list of all the groups the user belongs to.

      • printPosts

        public void printPosts()
        PrintPosts This method goes through the list of posts created by the method "establishConnection" and prints said posts.

        Creates a list of strings containing all the information regarding the posts from the list "result" and then selects a post to print.

      • getAccessToken

        public java.lang.String getAccessToken()
        getAccessToken

        Receives the Access Token necessary to connect to the user's Facebook profile.

        Returns:
        accessToken

        public com.restfb.FacebookClient getFacebookClient()

        Returns:
        fbClient5

      • getUserInfo

        public com.restfb.types.User getUserInfo()
        getUserInfo

        Uses the method getFacebookClient to fetch the online profile of a specific Facebook user

        Returns:
        The User Profile.

      • publishMessageStatus

        public void publishMessageStatus(java.lang.String message)
        publishMessageStatus

        Uses the publish method present in the RestFB API to post a message in the user's group.

        Parameters:
        message - , receives the message the user wants to publish

      • publishLinkStatus

        public void publishLinkStatus(java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.String link)
        publishLinkStatus

        Uses the publish method present in the RestFB API to post a link with an associated message in the user's group.

        Parameters:
        message - the message associated with the link
        link - the link the user wishes to share

      • publishImageStatus

        public void publishImageStatus(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String directory,
                               java.lang.String message)
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        publishImageStatus

        Uses the publish method present in the RestFB API to post an image followed by a message.

        Parameters:
        name - the of the image
        directory - the directory where the image is stored
        message - the message associated with the image
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
